title: Small wording problem in go spec.
body:
In the [Declarations and scope](https://golang.org/ref/spec#Declarations_and_scope) section, which says:
> A declaration binds a non-blank identifier to a constant, type, variable, function, label, or package.

Here, a more proper word for "package" is "package import", for in the same section below, it says:
> The package clause is not a declaration;  ...
